DOC.brief_summary: To Evaluate Compare Efficacy Safety Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Versus Atorvastatin Hypercholesterolemic Patients High Risk Coronary Heart Disease Not Adequately Controlled Atorvastatin 40 mg .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Versus Atorvastatin Patients With High Cholesterol Not Controlled Atorvastatin 40 mg ( 0653-090 )
DOC.criteria: Patient LDLC > 70 mg/dL & stable dose atorvastatin 40 mg Pregnant lactate woman intend become pregnant Patient sensitivity intolerance ezetimibe atorvastatin
